name: Mac's Famous Mac & Cheese
steps: Combine milk and 1 1/2 cups water in a saucepan and bring to a simmer.
Toast Panko breadcrumbs in butter while waiting for milk and water to simmer.
Once simmering, pour in pasta and cook over medium-low heat until all the liquid is absorbed.
Once breadcrumbs look golden brown, remove from heat and mix in a bowl Parmesan cheese.
After pasta is done cooking add American cheese with Dijon mustard, and stir until melted.
Add sharp cheddar and cayenne, mix, then kill the heat and cover for 5 minutes.
